content:
Everlane does offer a bundle deal on the Tread sneakers and socks, which can be a great way to save some money.

**Tread Sneaker + Sock Bundle**: Right now, Everlane is offering a bundle deal on the Tread sneakers and a pair of their signature socks. When you buy the Tread sneakers, you can add a pair of socks to your order for just $10 (reg. $18). This is a great deal, as you'll save $8 on the socks.

To get the bundle deal, simply add the Tread sneakers to your cart, then navigate to the socks section and select the "Add to Bundle" option. The discount will be applied automatically at checkout.

**Additional Sock Discounts**: If you want to buy multiple pairs of socks, Everlane also offers a "Buy 3, Get 1 Free" deal on their socks. This can be a great way to stock up on socks and save even more money.

**Other Bundle Deals**: Everlane occasionally offers other bundle deals on their products, so it's always a good idea to check their website for current promotions. They might have bundles on other sneakers, apparel, or accessories that can help you save money.

Remember, Everlane's prices are already transparent and competitive, so these bundle deals are just an added bonus. Happy shopping!
